# isInfinite

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean indicating whether the specified float range is infinitely large.

## Declaration

```swift
var isInfinite: Bool { get }
```

## Testing the range values

- **UIFloatRangeIsEqualToRange(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean indicating whether two float ranges are equivalent.

items.description: Returns a Boolean indicating whether two float ranges are equivalent.
items.name: UIFloatRangeIsEqualToRange(_:_:)
